LanguageData.DMS_Machine_Hound.label: hound
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_Hound.description: A four-legged robot dog provide forward reconnaissance and urban combat support during armed operations, can equipped with small-caliber firearms or flamethrowers to provide certain containment capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_Hound.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_TrashBin.label: trash bin
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_TrashBin.description: cylindrical service robots used in Midworld cities provide road cleaning, express and food delivery services, and to be the first to assist in evacuation and maintain order when emergencies occur.
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_TrashBin.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBird.label: verling bird
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBird.description: A quad-drone for reconnaissance. It is quite fragile for combat but moves extremely fast. can equipped with small-caliber gun or grenade to provide certain containment capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBird.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBirdA.label: verling bird
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBirdA.description: A quad-drone for reconnaissance. It is quite fragile for combat but moves extremely fast. can equipped with small-caliber gun or grenade to provide certain containment capabilities.
